title: A Champion Quote and You
body:
Share those champion quotes that speak to you on a deep level! Mine are: 

{{champion:16}} "LIVE."

No matter what support I'm playing, that quote perfectly captures how I feel in tense situations.

{{champion:127}} "They cannot fight the cold."

And by cold, I mean CC. I love me my CC champs.

Share your own!

replies.body:
{{champion:238}} "What has been done, cannot be undone."

This describes perfectly what I feel like when I have a bad game and feed :P

{{champion:201}} "The goats are wise!"

My life explained.

"I knew you would do that"-{{champion:26}}  
When I 1 v 1 as a support and my team backs me up.

"I can feel their fear."{{champion:60}} 
Lol, this happens after I get fed as {{champion:60}} .

{{champion:34}}  "A heart of ice cannot bleed." 

Blackfrost Anivia for the win! Although this quote may be more personal than anything xD
That's one of my favourites too! You have lovely taste. :D
You do too for the Lissandra one :D I actually cosplayed Blade Queen Lissandra at PAX Prime, so I have a deep love for Anivia and Lissandra and their lore together xD

Thank you! Omg that is absolutely fantastic. I bet you were positively radiant and frightening. Anivia and Lissandra are actually my top two faves and I cannot tell you how pleased I am to hear someone appreciates them too.

It wasn't too bad :D it was my first cosplay and I spent like, 3 months on the helmet alone only for it to be super heavy and make my neck cramp xD It was so worth it though!
And yes, they are my favorites as well :) I just wish I played them like I used to xD
Sounds wonderful! Hope you had a good time. :)

It was loads of fun! Although next time I display in not doing one with a helmet that big xD no wonder nobody wants to stand next to her! 
{{champion:127}} ends up smacking people in the face wherever she goes. XD

when i get max lvl on an rpg

{{champion:45}} "MY POWER LVL IS OVER 9000!"
{{champion:157}}  "A wanderer isn't always lost."
{{champion:45}} "I am evil!" when people underestimate the absolute burst and straight up nukes.

"hmm I bet you were expecting some Un-bear-able pun"
Good ol' Voli {{champion:106}}  always reminding me that armored anthropomorphic polar bears are deep thinkers

Whenever I play any Moba

{{champion:14}} What's best in ~~death~~ life? To crush your enemies, see them driven before you, and hear the lamentation of noobs.

When Summer ends:
"DARKNESS" {{champion:56}}

{{champion:92}} "Learn from your mistakes." Ain't this quote the truth?

and

{{champion:75}} "Life is part of a cycle. Yours is over." Applies to me or my enemy in a game...
{{champion:69}} "If you are not controlling pawns, you are one."

{{champion:157}}  If you come to kill me, i hope you brought friends.

{{champion:45}} Oh it's game over... for you!

{{champion:238}} His laugh
"Jokes on you"...everytime the jukes come out with shaco.
YOU CANT MILK THOSE{{champion:12}}
your skills are inferior, because i'm god awful at league

"I never skip breakfast."{{champion:154}} 

when I go 4/0 Zac top in ten minutes because everyone underestimates Flubber

{{champion:103}} "Don't you trust me?"

{{champion:99}} "With your power level, I suggest you forfeit instead."
